alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 4:16AM PST until February 24 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * CHANGES...Timing on Lake Wind Advisory adjusted due to issuance of a Winter Weather Advisory. * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 3 to 5 feet. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
